edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter
Class PositionStatisticsCalculator

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter.PositionStatisticsCalculator

public class PositionStatisticsCalculator
extends Object

Can be fed PositionInfo messages, and generates useful statistics that are kept updated. Currently calculates total distance, final position, and distance from initial position to final position.
